Peter Thiel 同肥龐同場爆料講 Facebook 中國滲透反香港人，咁爆冇人講嘅？

“ At Facebook, I’ll give you an example. You had with the Hong Kong protest a year ago, the employees from Hong Kong were all in favor of the protests and free speech. But there were more employees at Facebook who were born in China than who were born in Hong Kong. And the Chinese nationals actually said that, you know, it was just Western arrogance. And shouldnt be taking Hong Kong’s side and things like that.

And then the rest of the employees at Facebook sort of stayed out of it. But the internal debate felt like people were actually more anti-Hong Kong than pro-Hong Kong. (Overlapping speakers). ”
